LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.label: Power Armor
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.description: An advanced suit of armor powered by uranium. It is usually used by assault troops from advanced glitterworld planets.
LanguageData.Apparel_PhaseArmor.label: Phase Armor
LanguageData.Apparel_PhaseArmor.description: Reinforced medium armor for uncommon operations.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorRecon.label: recon armor
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorRecon.description: A suit of light partially-powered armor, designed to permit quick movement. Lightweight plasteel-weave plates block attacks without compromising mobility, and neuro-memetic assistors in the lower body allow a human to wear the armor and still move easily.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial scout troops and glitterworld police forces.
LanguageData.Apparello_HA.label: Hive Armor
LanguageData.Apparello_HA.description: Armor that is fashioned after the centipede body structure. This extremely bulky armor is nigh indestructable. The sheer weight of this piece of armor drastically hinders mobility.
LanguageData.Apparello_Steamhull.label: Steamhull
LanguageData.Apparello_Steamhull.description: A combination of mobility enhancing components of the Scyther frame and heavy plating of the Hive armor. The increased energy consumption from the added scyther frame servos have forced the shock dampeners to work on lesser capacity, thus rendering the wearer more vulnerable to injuries but the higher mobility under combat situations is well worth it. It generates absurd amounts of heat though.
LanguageData.Apparel_HellPowerArmor.label: Hell Armor MK2
LanguageData.Apparel_HellPowerArmor.description: An advanced suit of armor powered by uranium. It is usually used by assault troops from advanced glitterworld planets.
LanguageData.Rimarsenal_InteractorCloak.label: Interactor Cloak
LanguageData.Rimarsenal_InteractorCloak.description: A special interactor cloak. Provides good insulation from heat and cold.
LanguageData.Siegearmor.label: Siege Armor
LanguageData.Siegearmor.description: This is a set of JE-342A7 "Dvergr (Dwarf)" siege armor, minus the helmet. Like many other fort-world corporation products, Dvergr siege armor has a single main purpose. In this case, the main purpose is the survival of the wearer at any cost.
LanguageData.CCArmor.label: Close Combat Armor
LanguageData.CCArmor.description: The JE-257A1 "Einherjar" close combat armor is a modified version of "Dvergr" siege armor. Some of the thick armor plates have been removed so that high powered actuators and fast recharging shields could be installed.
